works.description:
I have invented an free energy producing device that I call Energy Machine and the description of this device is showing up on Google search. I shared information about this device with members of some Yahoo free energy groups and this information has been posted on the internet without my permission by a webiste  called xa.yimg.com 

The information about this device that is posted on the internet is contained in two files and the first file begin like this : "Energy Machine is a machine that produces mechanical energy from gravity...."

The second file begin like this : "Disconnecting and reversing Fa in order to produce free energy..."  There is also on this page a drawing for Energy Machine.
